subject: Minor Leagues
Doping (Sports)
Baseball
Tests and Testing
lead_paragraph: Even though Commissioner Bud Selig said Major League Baseball would stop giving teams 24-hour notice before drug testers showed up, minor league teams still received advance notice.
snippet: Even though Commissioner Bud Selig said Major League Baseball would stop giving teams 24-hour notice before drug testers showed up, minor league teams still received advance notice.
